Detailed Description

This class provides a simple and fast tokenizer.

Constructor & Destructor Documentation

)
Parameters:
str The string to tokenize.
delim The delimiter used to split the string.

Member Function Documentation

wxString CSimpleTokenizer::next (  ) 

Returns the next part of the string separated by the given delimiter.

When the entire string has been tokenized, an empty string is returned. Note that empty tokens are also returned.

References m_count, m_delim, m_ptr, and m_string.

wxString CSimpleTokenizer::remaining (  )  const

Returns the remaining part of the string.

The remaining part is defined as being the part after the last encountered token, or an empty string if the entire string has been tokenized.

If next() has yet to be called, the entire string will be returned.

References m_ptr, and m_string.
